name: Seepath Solutions
tagline: Help you to realize business benefits quickly
description:
Seepath Solutions delivers Microsoft® Dynamics™ ERP and CRM solutions, CRM 2011 online add-on products and Microsoft volume licensing services to customer across SMB to Fortune 500 Corporations like BNP Paribas.  Seepath is a cloud accelerate Partner offering hosted Dynamics GP 2010, Dynamics AX 2012 and Office 365 solutions.
As a leading ISV, Seepath offers CRM 2011 online add-on products to customer worldwide that are Microsoft Platform Ready tested and is powered by Windows Azure. Seepath is a SMB certified by State of NJ and DMBE Virginia.gov and it offers complete cloud solutions to customer across verticals.
